title.narrative: North Eastern States Roads Investment Program (Project 2)

description.narrative: The proposed project is for the improvement of about 235 km of state roads in the states of Assam, Manipur, Mizoram, and Tripura. All these roads have been selected as per the procedures and criteria outlined under selection and approval process for project roads. Project Management Consultant recruited under the Project 1 will assist the implementation of Project 2 and technical assistance provided by ADB will support the institutional development and capacity building of each state.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Development of North Eastern Region
Public Works Department - State of Mizoram
Public Works Department - State of Tripura
Public Works Department State of Assam
Public Works Department State of Manipur

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Improved efficiency of road transport in the projet areas in the states of Assam, Manipur, Mizoram and Tripura

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Travel time on the project roads reduced by 20-40% from 17km/h (Assam), 18km/h (Manipur), 8km/h (Mizoram) and 20km/h (Tripura) respectively in 2013

description.narrative: Improved efficiency of road transport in the projet areas in the states of Assam, Manipur, Mizoram and Tripura

title.narrative: Vehicle operating cost on the project roads reduced by 50% for three-axle trucks and by 20% for passenger buses at completion from INR220 (Assam), INR250 (Manipur), INR170 (Mizoram) and INR130 (Tripura) per vehicle-km respectively in 2013

description.narrative: Improved efficiency of road transport in the projet areas in the states of Assam, Manipur, Mizoram and Tripura
